summary: The Telegram Dog - Throughout its history, Telegram has remained dedicated to upholding freedom of speech and safeguarding user privacy, offering a top-notch social platform. When faced with government pressure to disclose user data, Pavel Durov stood firm and defiantly shared a picture on social media - TGDOG! TGDOG symbolizes the values of decentralization and free speech in the encrypted realm. Join us in the fight for freedom!
